-  init(identifier:title:indexingKey:getSetter:) 

Initializer# init(identifier:title:indexingKey:getSetter:)

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+

```
convenience init<Entity>(
    identifier: String,
    title: LocalizedStringResource,
    indexingKey: PartialKeyPath<CSSearchableItemAttributeSet>,
    getSetter: WritableKeyPath<Entity, Value>
) where Entity : AppEntity
```

Available when `Value` conforms to `_IntentValue`, `Value` conforms to `Sendable`, `Value.ValueType` conforms to `Decodable`, and `Value.ValueType` conforms to `Encodable`.
title: init(identifier:title:indexingKey:getSetter:) | Apple Developer Documentation
